comment.author: Kody
comment.text: She's feeding into the black lives matter and making this country racially divided even more.. what a country this'll be if she wins.. go TRUMP. WE NEED YOU. OH GOD, WE NEED YOU NOW

replies.author: Mackenzi
replies.text: Pathetic only one word to describe the ignorance of a group that are being brainwashed not only by peer pressure but also their parents and Trump!!! The Trump effect attacking our children. How can anyone support this bigot??? A result of a failed education system where ignorance is allowed to grow and teachers biased in their politics caring not to prevent history from repeating its self.
